title: Billy Vigar, Chichester and former Arsenal player, dies after sustaining brain injury
description: The Chichester City forward Billy Vigar has died at the age of 21 after sustaining a ‘significant brain injury’ in a game last Saturday
content: The Chichester City forward Billy Vigar has died at the age of 21 after sustaining a “significant brain injury” in a game last Saturday. The former Arsenal player was injured in an Isthmian League match at Wingate & Finchley, leading to its abandonme... [1398 chars]

title: Labour’s internal warfare breaks open as Starmer and ministers criticise Andy Burnham
description: Starmer is understood to be furious at Greater Manchester mayor’s admission that he would seek to challenge for the leadership
content:
Labour’s internal warfare broke into the open on Thursday as Keir Starmer and several cabinet ministers criticised Andy Burnham over his comments dismissing the bond markets.
Senior Labour figures compared the Greater Manchester mayor’s attitude to t... [5113 chars]

title: Trump urges Erdogan to stop buying Russian oil as they meet at White House
description: The Turkish president is in Washington and seeking deals on defence and energy worth tens of billions of US dollars.
content:
Erdogan leaves White House
Bernd Debusmann Jr
Reporting from the White House
Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has departed from the White House, after just over two hours with Donald Trump.

title: Telford's £20m Pride in Place fund is a 'game-changer'
description: Telford's council leader says the new Pride in Place Programme funding is a "shot in the arm".
content:
Three neighbourhoods in the south of Telford will be given £20m over the next decade to revive things like high streets, parks and green spaces.
The funding for Woodside, Sutton Hill and Brookside is from the government's new Pride in Place Programme... [669 chars]

title: Starmer to announce plans for digital ID scheme
description: The prime minister believes a new scheme would help crack down on illegal working in the UK.
content:
